Room.Name: Waterfront Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Waterfront Way, north of the Golden Dolphin Inn.
Room.LongDescription: The intersection with Hafnia Way lies to the east of here. There is a long stretch of road between here and the next section of town, as you must pass through the various agricultural fields to the east. The Golden Dolphin Inn lies to the South and Waterfront Plaza is located to the north. You cannot enter the plaza from here, though. Entrances are on Main and Hafnia.
